trans-unit.resname: AFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Name
AFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may cast Aura and Equipment spells from the top of your library. When you cast an Equipment spell this way, it gains "When this Equipment enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control."
trans-unit.target: 你可以从你的牌库顶施放灵气和武具咒语。当你以此法施放武具咒语时，它获得「当此武具进战场时，将它贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Name
AFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Mystic Arcanum — At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: 玄奥秘法～在你的结束步骤开始时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Pact Boon — Whenever you play a card from exile, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 魔契之赐～每当你从放逐区使用牌时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Name
AFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, venture into the dungeon. This ability triggers only once each turn. (To venture into the dungeon, enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，深入地城。此异能每回合只会触发一次。（深入地城的流程是进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Create Undead — Whenever you complete a dungeon, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 唤起死灵～每当你完成地城时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·4 | Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients | Card Name
AFC·4 | Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you may create a 5/4 red and green Dragon Spirit creature token with "When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当先祖之怒沃隆迪斯受到伤害时，你可以派出一个5/4，红绿双色的龙／精怪衍生生物，且具有「当此生物造成伤害时，将它牺牲。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·4 | Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you roll one or more dice, you may have Vrondiss deal 1 damage to itself.
trans-unit.target: 每当你掷一颗或数颗骰子时，你可以使沃隆迪斯对本身造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·5 | Fey Steed | Card Name
AFC·5 | Fey Steed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当妖精荒野骏鹿攻击时，另一个目标由你操控且进行攻击的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·5 | Fey Steed | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物或鹏洛客成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·6 | Holy Avenger | Card Name
AFC·6 | Holy Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有连击异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·6 | Holy Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, you may put an Aura card from your hand onto the battlefield attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物造成战斗伤害时，你可以将一张灵气牌从你手上放进战场并贴附于其上。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·6 | Holy Avenger | Card Text | Paragraph 3
AFC·7 | Immovable Rod | Card Name
AFC·7 | Immovable Rod | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择于你的重置步骤中不重置不动权杖。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·7 | Immovable Rod | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes untapped, venture into the dungeon.
trans-unit.target: 每当不动权杖成为未横置时，深入地城。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·7 | Immovable Rod | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}, {T}: For as long as CARDNAME remains tapped, another target permanent loses all abilities and can't attack or block.
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}，{T}：于不动权杖持续横置的时段内，另一个目标永久物失去所有异能，且不能进行攻击或阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·8 | Mantle of the Ancients | Card Name
AFC·8 | Mantle of the Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 结附于由你操控的生物

trans-unit.resname: AFC·8 | Mantle of the Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return any number of target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 当先贤披风进战场时，将任意数量目标灵气和／或武具牌从你的坟墓场移回战场并贴附在所结附的生物上。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·8 | Mantle of the Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物上每贴附一个灵气或武具，便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·9 | Radiant Solar | Card Name
AFC·9 | Radiant Solar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·9 | Radiant Solar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 每当辉光炽天神侍或另一个非衍生物的生物在你的操控下进战场时，深入地城。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·9 | Radiant Solar | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {W}, Discard CARDNAME: Venture into the dungeon and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: {W}，弃掉辉光炽天神侍：深入地城，且你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·10 | Revivify | Card Name
AFC·10 | Revivify | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Roll a d20 and add the number of creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn.
trans-unit.target: 掷一颗d20，然后将点数加上本回合中从战场进入你坟墓场的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·10 | Revivify | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: 1–14 | Return all creature cards in your graveyard that were put there from the battlefield this turn to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 1～14 | 将本回合中从战场进入你坟墓场的生物牌从该处移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·10 | Revivify | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: 15+ | Return those cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 15+ | 将这些牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·11 | Robe of Stars | Card Name
AFC·11 | Robe of Stars | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·11 | Robe of Stars | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Astral Projection — {1}{W}: Equipped creature phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)
trans-unit.target: 星界投射～{1}{W}：佩带此武具的生物跃离。（直到其操控者的下一个回合，该生物及贴附于其上的所有东西都视作不存在。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·11 | Robe of Stars | Card Text | Paragraph 3
AFC·12 | Thorough Investigation | Card Name
AFC·12 | Thorough Investigation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，探查。（派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·12 | Thorough Investigation | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个线索时，深入地城。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·13 | Valiant Endeavor | Card Name
AFC·13 | Valiant Endeavor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Roll two d6 and choose one result. Destroy each creature with power greater than or equal to that result. Then create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the other result.
trans-unit.target: 掷两颗d6并选择一个掷骰结果。消灭所有力量等于或大于该掷骰结果的生物。然后派出若干2/2白色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物，其数量等同于另一个掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·14 | Arcane Endeavor | Card Name
AFC·14 | Arcane Endeavor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Roll two d8 and choose one result. Draw cards equal to that result. Then you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to the other result from your hand without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 掷两颗d8并选择一个掷骰结果。抓数量等同于该掷骰结果的牌。然后你可以从你手上施放一个瞬间或法术咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用，但其法术力值须等于或小于另一个掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·15 | Diviner's Portent | Card Name
AFC·15 | Diviner's Portent | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Roll a d20 and add the number of cards in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 掷一颗d20，然后将点数加上你的手牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·15 | Diviner's Portent | Card Text | Paragraph 2
AFC·15 | Diviner's Portent | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: 15+ | Scry X, then draw X cards.

trans-unit.resname: AFC·16 | Minn, Wily Illusionist | Card Name
AFC·16 | Minn, Wily Illusionist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 1/1 blue Illusion creature token with "This creature gets +1/+0 for each other Illusion you control."
trans-unit.target: 每当你抓每回合中你的第二张牌时，派出一个1/1蓝色虚影衍生生物，且具有「你每操控一个其他虚影，此生物便得+1/+0。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·16 | Minn, Wily Illusionist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Illusion you control dies, you may put a permanent card with mana value less than or equal to that creature's power from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的虚影死去时，你可以将一张法术力值等于或小于该生物力量的永久物牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·17 | Netherese Puzzle-Ward | Card Name
AFC·17 | Netherese Puzzle-Ward | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Focus Beam — At the beginning of your upkeep, roll a d4. Scry X, where X is the result.
trans-unit.target: 汇聚光线～在你的维持开始时，掷一颗d4。占卜X，X为掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·17 | Netherese Puzzle-Ward | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Perfect Illumination — Whenever you roll a die's highest natural result, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 完美亮度～每当你掷出某骰子的最大原值结果时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·18 | Phantom Steed | Card Name
AFC·18 | Phantom Steed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·18 | Phantom Steed | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile another target creature you control until CARDNAME leaves the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当魅影驹进战场时，放逐另一个目标由你操控的生物，直到魅影驹离开战场为止。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·18 | Phantom Steed | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of the exiled creature, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types. Sacrifice that token at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当魅影驹攻击时，派出一个已横置且正进行攻击的衍生物，该衍生物为所放逐之生物的复制品，但它额外具有虚影此类别。在战斗结束时，牺牲该衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·19 | Rod of Absorption | Card Name
AFC·19 | Rod of Absorption | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, exile it instead of putting it into a graveyard as it resolves.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放瞬间或法术咒语，于该咒语结算时，改为将它放逐，而非置入坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·19 | Rod of Absorption | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {X}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled with CARDNAME with total mana value X or less without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: {X}，{T}，牺牲吸收法力权杖：你可以从以吸收法力权杖放逐的牌之中施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用，但这些咒语的法术力值总和须等于或小于X。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·20 | Winged Boots | Card Name
AFC·20 | Winged Boots | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has flying and ward {4}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有飞行与守护{4}。（每当佩带此武具的生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{4}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·20 | Winged Boots | Card Text | Paragraph 2
AFC·21 | Bag of Devouring | Card Name
AFC·21 | Bag of Devouring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice another nontoken artifact or creature, exile it.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲另一个非衍生物的神器或生物时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·21 | Bag of Devouring | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice another artifact or creature: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲另一个神器或生物：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·21 | Bag of Devouring | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Roll a d10. Return up to X cards from among cards exiled with CARDNAME to their owners' hands, where X is the result.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}，牺牲吞噬袋：掷一颗d10。将以吞噬袋放逐之牌中的至多X张移回其拥有者手上，X为掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·22 | Danse Macabre | Card Name
AFC·22 | Danse Macabre | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices a nontoken creature. Roll a d20 and add the toughness of the creature you sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲一个非衍生物的生物。掷一颗d20，然后将点数加上你以此法牺牲之生物的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·22 | Danse Macabre | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: 1–14 | Return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 1～14 | 将一张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·22 | Danse Macabre | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: 15+ | Return up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 15+ | 将至多两张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·23 | Death Tyrant | Card Name
AFC·23 | Death Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·23 | Death Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Negative Energy Cone — Whenever an attacking creature you control or a blocking creature an opponent controls dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 负能量锥～每当一个由你操控且进行攻击的生物或一个由对手操控且进行阻挡的生物死去时，派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·23 | Death Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {5}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {5}{B}：将死亡暴君从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·24 | Grave Endeavor | Card Name
AFC·24 | Grave Endeavor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Roll two d10 and choose one result. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to that result. Then each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the other result.
trans-unit.target: 掷两颗d10并选择一个掷骰结果。将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量等同于该掷骰结果。然后每位对手各失去X点生命，且你获得X点生命，X为另一个掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·25 | Grim Hireling | Card Name
AFC·25 | Grim Hireling | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, create two Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出两个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·25 | Grim Hireling | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice X Treasures: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲X个珍宝：目标生物得-X/-X直到回合结束。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·26 | Hellish Rebuke | Card Name
AFC·26 | Hellish Rebuke | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, permanents your opponents control gain "When this permanent deals damage to the player who cast CARDNAME, sacrifice this permanent. You lose 2 life."
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，由对手操控的永久物获得「当此永久物对施放炼狱叱喝的牌手造成伤害时，牺牲此永久物。你失去2点生命。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·27 | Lorcan, Warlock Collector | Card Name
AFC·27 | Lorcan, Warlock Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·27 | Lorcan, Warlock Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may pay life equal to its mana value. If you do, put it onto the battlefield under your control. It's a Warlock in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张生物牌从任何区域进入对手的坟墓场时，你可以支付等同于其法术力值的生命。若你如此作，则将它在你的操控下放进战场。它额外具有邪术师此类别。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·27 | Lorcan, Warlock Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If a Warlock you control would die, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个由你操控的邪术师将死去，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·28 | Wand of Orcus | Card Name
AFC·28 | Wand of Orcus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature attacks or blocks, it and Zombies you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物攻击或阻挡时，它和由你操控的灵俑均获得死触异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·28 | Wand of Orcus | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出等量的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·28 | Wand of Orcus | Card Text | Paragraph 3
AFC·29 | Berserker's Frenzy | Card Name
AFC·29 | Berserker's Frenzy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only before combat or during combat before blockers are declared.
trans-unit.target: 只能于战斗前或战斗中宣告阻挡者前施放此咒语。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·29 | Berserker's Frenzy | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Roll two d20 and ignore the lower roll.
trans-unit.target: 掷两颗d20并忽略较小点数。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·29 | Berserker's Frenzy | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: 1–14 | Choose any number of creatures. They block this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 1～14 | 选择任意数量的生物。它们本回合若能进行阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·29 | Berserker's Frenzy | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: 15–20 | You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.
trans-unit.target: 15～20 | 本回合中，由你选择哪些生物进行阻挡，以及这些生物将如何阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·30 | Chaos Dragon | Card Name
AFC·30 | Chaos Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·30 | Chaos Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 混乱巨龙每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·30 | Chaos Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player rolls a d20. If one or more opponents had the highest result, CARDNAME can't attack those players or planeswalkers they control this combat.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，每位牌手各掷一颗d20。如果一位或数位对手的掷骰结果最大，则混乱巨龙本次战斗中不能攻击这些牌手或由其操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·31 | Fiendlash | Card Name
AFC·31 | Fiendlash | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has reach.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+0且具有延势异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·31 | Fiendlash | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature is dealt damage, it deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物受到伤害时，它对目标牌手或鹏洛客造成等同于其力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·31 | Fiendlash | Card Text | Paragraph 3
AFC·32 | Maddening Hex | Card Name
AFC·32 | Maddening Hex | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·32 | Maddening Hex | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted player casts a noncreature spell, roll a d6. CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the result. Then attach CARDNAME to another one of your opponents chosen at random.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的牌手施放非生物咒语时，你掷一颗d6。癫狂巫咒对该牌手造成等同于掷骰结果的伤害。然后你随机选择另一位对手并将癫狂巫咒贴附于其上。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·33 | Reckless Endeavor | Card Name
AFC·33 | Reckless Endeavor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Roll two d12 and choose one result. CARDNAME deals damage equal to that result to each creature. Then create a number of Treasure tokens equal to the other result.
trans-unit.target: 掷两颗d12并选择一个掷骰结果。鲁莽勇进对每个生物各造成伤害，其数量等同于该掷骰结果。然后派出若干珍宝衍生物，其数量等同于另一个掷骰结果。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·34 | Share the Spoils | Card Name
AFC·34 | Share the Spoils | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or an opponent loses the game, exile the top card of each player's library.
trans-unit.target: 当分享战利品进战场或任一对手输掉这盘游戏时，放逐每位牌手的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·34 | Share the Spoils | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: During each player's turn, that player may play a land or cast a spell from among cards exiled with CARDNAME, and they may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell. When they do, exile the top card of their library.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手于自己的回合中，可以从以分享战利品放逐的牌之中使用一个地或施放一个咒语，且其可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。当他如此作时，放逐其牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·35 | Vengeful Ancestor | Card Name
AFC·35 | Vengeful Ancestor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
AFC·35 | Vengeful Ancestor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, goad target creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 每当复仇先祖进战场或攻击时，煽惑目标生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·35 | Vengeful Ancestor | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a goaded creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to its controller.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个已煽惑的生物攻击时，它对其操控者造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·36 | Wild-Magic Sorcerer | Card Name
AFC·36 | Wild-Magic Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The first spell you cast from exile each turn has cascade. (When you cast your first spell from exile, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 你每回合中从放逐区施放的第一个咒语具有倾曳异能。（当你从放逐区施放你的第一个咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比该咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.target: {4}{G}，{T}：掷一颗d8。从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张法术力值等同于该掷骰结果的生物牌为止。将该牌放进战场，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

AFR·402 | Prosperous Innkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 当兴隆旅店主进战场时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·402 | Prosperous Innkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。
